questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Brimstail in a cave west of the bank in the Gnome Stronghold. Look for dungeon link on mini map (Chat 1•1•1•✓)
Inspect the singing bowl in the western portion of the cave.
To the north, attempt to unlock Oaknock's Machine and use Oaknock's Exchanger.
Talk to Hazelmere (island east of Yanille, fairy ring CLS) for several cutscenes. He provides you with a violet pentagon.
Grind mud rune and use on bucket of sap.
Use the magic glue, a set of maple, and oak logs on Oaknock's Exchanger and Repair it.

Talk to Brimstail. (Chat 1)
Talk to him again several (3+) times to receive more discs. Use the drop trick.
additionalStepInformation: The more discs, the more streamlined the process in the next step becomes as you require little to no converting.

questSteps.stepDescription: Unlock machine to view the desired number.
If necessary, use the exchanger to get a disc equal to your number. Use the Conversion Chart at this step.
Unlock the machine with the correct value disc. Click the small green square to submit the disc.
Unlock the machine again to get 3 different numbers (the second unlock will require many more discs). Use the exchanger as necessary. The 2nd number requires using 2 discs and the 3rd requires 3.
additionalStepInformation: If you intend to do The Path of Glouphrie afterwards, keep the discs in your Inventory or Bank they are needed here as well.

questSteps.stepDescription: Kill the evil creature by Brimstail and talk to him. (1/6).
Go talk to the king about the evil creatures.
Kill the 5 remaining evil creatures, which can be done in any order. Locations to these evil creatures are in Additional Information.
additionalStepInformation: (2/6) By the main gate to the stronghold (south-east from Brimstail's cave)
(3/6) South of the spirit tree by the gnome agility course entrance.
(4/6) In the giant tortoise pen north-west of the Grand Tree and north of the swamp.

(5/6) Top floor of the Grand Tree, next to the small prison/by the ladder (wait for the chat response saying you killed it before using the ladder. If it doesn't count it, an evil creature should respawn at one of the locations.)

(6/6) Near King Narnode (may need ranged, magic or necromancy as it can get stuck behind a trapdoor). Check your quest journal if your chat log does not display 6 creatures, if it says you need to talk to the king then you are finished.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to King Narnode Shareen on the ground floor of the Grand Tree.
